thread.title: BPD To Hold Press Conference About Missing Mother And Daughter
thread.title_full: BPD To Hold Press Conference About Missing Mother And Daughter

title: BPD To Hold Press Conference About Missing Mother And Daughter
text:
BPD To Hold Press Conference About Missing Mother, Daughter « CBS Baltimore 
WJZ at Orioles Spring Training: Mark Viviano reports live tonight from Florida 
February 16, 2017 10:59 AM 
Photo credit: Baltimore Police Department 
BALTIMORE (WJZ) — Baltimore Police plan to hold a press conference this afternoon about a mother and daughter who have been missing since Feb. 7. 
A friend of the family reported the disappearance of Joanna Antionette Clark, 33, and her daughter Shariece Nicole Clark, 15. 
They live in the 2800 block of Round Road and were last seen on Feb. 4. 
The mother is described as 5-foot-3 and 140 pounds.
